channel.title: ~HardDrives, will they help? ~ Urgent, I need to know within a hour!~
channel.description:
I was wonder, if I bought myself a 80gb HradDrive*, will this help eliminate lag? (Provoding that my server will be completely dependent on the new HD)
Thx
* (I can get a 80gb HD for only $25, so price dosent matter)
Thx
